DOC.detailed_description: Background The number couple undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) rapidly grow worldwide . However , approximately 5 % aspirated human oocytes competence implant develop child ( Ziebe , 2013 ) . Reasons low percentage competence include genetic abnormality metabolic problem . Moreover , oocyte developmental competence decrease woman age , therefore maternal age single best predictor reproductive outcome woman ( Keefe et al , 2015 ) . In general , age process complex include impaired mitochondrial dysfunction , oxidative stress , diminish metabolic activity , activity several cell-signaling system ( Bentov , 2011 ) . Oocyte Competency Key Embryo Potential The oocyte major determinant embryo developmental competence woman . The oocyte transmit mother 's nuclear also mitochondrial genome embryo . The maternal paternal genome neither symmetrical equal contribution embryo fate . Oxygen Consumption Oocyte/Embryo Competence Clinically useful biomarkers oocyte competency need ( Keefe et al , 2015 ) . Oxygen consumption quality marker human oocyte competence condition ovarian stimulation regimen ( Tejera et al. , 2011 ) . Furthermore , oxygen consumption rate embryos find associate successful implantation use select embryo best developmental potential ( Tejera et al. , 2012 ) . Rationale Studying Cumulus Cells Ovarian follicle highly specialized structure support growth development oocytes control ovarian stimulation IVF . Cumulus cell somatic cell form intimate association oocyte follicle . Cumulus cell possess specialized cytoplasmic projection penetrate zona pellucida [ shell ] form gap junction tip oocyte , generate elaborate structure call cumulus-oocyte complex ( COC ) ( Albertini et al. , 2001 ; Gilchrist et al. , 2008 ) . Cumulus cell metabolize bulk glucose consume COC supply metabolic intermediate oocyte , COC glucose metabolism pivotal determine oocyte developmental competence ( Sutton-McDowall et al. , 2010 ) . It well know cumulus cell support oocyte development provision essential nutrient , information molecule , metabolic precursor signal molecule ( Hutt et al. , 2007 ) . Because metabolic communication link cumulus oocyte , glucose availability metabolism within cumulus significant impact oocyte meiotic developmental competence ( Thompson JG , 2007 ) . If coordinate somatic cell-oocyte interaction perturb metabolic disease and/or maternal aging , molecular damage oocyte alter macromolecule , induce mitochondrial mutation , harm oocyte ( Dumesic et al , 2015 ) . For example , 2015 Hsu et al . report endometriosis may associate mitochondrial dysfunction pool cumulus cell , subject endometriosis may defect cumulus cell mitochondrial function , may contribute decreased fertilization implantation rate ( Barnhart et al. , 2002 ) . The purpose study determine mitochondrial respiratory activity cumulus cell associate maternal age reproductive outcome ( oocyte competence ) .
